trans-unit.source: Defines the test to determine whether a code assembly is a member of a code group.
trans-unit.target: 定义测试以确定代码程序集是否是代码组的成员。

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 证据集，将根据它进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的证据是否能满足成员条件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的证据满足成员条件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 创建成员条件的等效副本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 当前成员条件的完全相同的新副本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否等同于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see langword="true" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回成员条件的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the state of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 当前成员条件状态的字符串表示形式。
